Concert Works


Traps, for four channel audio with audio processing, 2019
performed at Daedong College, Busan, South Korea , 8/2019

Shadow’s Shadow, for four channel audio with hand motion sensors, 2018
performed at the University of California Santa Cruz, 9/2018

UniversesrevinU, for four channel audio with hand motion sensors, 2018
performed at Symbolic Sound Co., Urbana-Champaign, 5/2018

Canción, for vocal baritone and piano, 2018
performed at the University of Illinois at Urbana-Champaign, 1/2018

Love Birds, for trombone with computer-generated audio, 2016
performed at the University of Illinois at Urbana-Champaign, 12/2016

Le Chute, for four channel audio, 2015
performed at Kansas City Kansas Community College, 11/2015; at the University of North Texas, Denton, TX , 9/2015; at Kainan University, Taoyuan, Taiwan , 12/2016

Binbinlayan, for children’s choir, 2014

ZauberClavier, for piano with computer-generated audio, 2014
performed at the University of Illinois at Urbana-Champaign, 3/2016

Bring in the Wine, for soprano and piano, 2013

Woods, for two percussion, 2013

Axonometric Projection, for eight channel audio, 2013
performed at the University of Athens, Greece , 9/2014

Uno Canto, for four to seven voices, 2012
performed at the University of Illinois at Urbana-Champaign, 9/2012

Deì, for two theremins and two pianos, 2012

Uniformity Theory, for four channel audio, 2012

Synchronicity, for flute, clarinet, piano and string quartet, 2012

Wondering Beyond, for computer-generated audio, 2011

For Flute Solo, for flute, 2010
performed at the University of Illinois at Urbana-Champaign, 5/2013
